div.p:
The fyft day of the monetht of September' the yer' of god jM iiijC
nynty and nyne yeris Donald' Srathin Jonhne Duncansone Johne talyour
and george l pottaris Sone Callit Sandy pottar was suorne the
gret aithe In presence of Androw Cullan eldar ane of the balyeis Androw nachtj
and William scrimgeor' sergiandis to pris' thir gudis vndir writin pertening to Johne
of glenmaluyn to be deliuerit to Jonhne of tulibow for his necessar
Sustentacioun and vphald of his lyve becaus' he had' nane vthir gudis
In the first xiij pece of Stepis weyand xliiij li' price of the pvnd'
viij d' Item tua chargeoris weyand xij li' price li' xij d' Item xj pece
platis dublaris and dischis weyand' xxxtj li' price li' x d' ij pottis j posnetis
weyand xxv li' price li' ix d' / iij pon'n' possibly overwritten with something else.tis v chandlaris ij lawaris j bassy
ane hyngand' lavar' j chaffar' iij brokin bras' xlij li' price li' vij d'
the Some of thir gudis is v li' ix s' vij d' Item sauld'
v f' of Salt the boll for demi markis a pane for v s' and vj d' sex coddis
for iij s' and vj d' xxiiij elne of herdin clath to viij s' be the said' Johne tulibow
Summa xxv s' and iiij d' Item ane cowntour price xl s' j schryne xv s'
j caldrone xx s' j prevys kyst x s' j matrace bed' vij s' j arras'
bed' xvijj s' ane almary xx s' ij per schetis price viij s' ij burdis clathtis
vj s' j girnale pip ij s' the Some vij li' vj s' Summa totalis
xiiij li' j d' les' Of this
Sone Some gevin to Thome glenmalyun j pot price
iiij s' j per schetis iiij s' j peuter dische x d' j per schetis to bessy his oy
iiij s' befor sere Dauid Walcar' And' of this hale Some Is to be
allowit to the said' Jonhne tulibow fra the xxjtj day of Aprile immediatlie
bigan Ilkan day xij d' to his expens' and his sereandis extendinge
to ix li' Item pait for the said' Jonhnez' of glenmaluyngis exequies
processionis to the kirk richtis and for his layr' and ale deuyteis pertening
tharto xlviij s' and iiij d' Ande of thir gudis Will gray has resavit
the almarry presit to xx s' with ane balye and Alexander gray is souerte to kep
the said' Johne skathles tharanant et cetera

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvij
die mensis Januarij anno quo Supra

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis'
William blinsel forspeker that george bell skippar of the
pellicane sal content and pay to William of gareache
fyve stikis of yrne coresponden' to the wecht of
the thousand'

the saide day Androw Cullan yongar protestit the Sele of caus'
to be affixit tile ane acquitance to quiet'clame the
widew of vmquhile Evmond of vij li' g' xiij s'
g' and vj d' g' and of al vthiris merchandice et cetera befor the aldirman
James Colison' Johne mar' ij bailyeis Richard ruthirfurd'
Duncan Colison' Johne Colison' Dauid Kintor george bell

the saide day Jonhne richerdsone ayr to vmquhile
William fyve burges of this burghe grantit him fullie pait
of al gudis of ayrschip pertening to him be deces' of the
said' vmquhile William / and dischargit and quiet'clamit
the s be the handis of Johne Steuinson' / the said Johne his
ayris executouris and assignez' for him his ayris executouris and assignis now
and foreuire

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem Vicesimo
die Januarij

The saide day / It was deliuerit be ane suorne' assis' patrik leslie
forspekar that Jonhne of chamer sal pay to sanct Nicholes' werk
viij s' of the Rest of ane fraucht and xl d' to Androw cristeson'

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxv
die mensis Januarij anno quo Supra

the saide day the widew of Dauid mathesone grantit scho hed'
na richt to the demi nethis fischingis of the mydchingile quhilk the
saide Dauid hed' and scho declarit opinlie that the saide Dauid
maid' nayn assignay of his said' demi nethis fischingis for the quhilkis
It was fundin be the court that the air' hed' richt to the saide fischingis
for ony thing' schevin in the Contrar' and the Curat declarit that David
matheson' maid nayn assignay to the said' demi nethis

add.foreign: assignacio facta preposito de dimidio Rethis de midchingill

div.p:
the saide day Jonhne glenny assignit the demi nethis fischingis of the myd
chingile pertening to him and his spous' and the half nethis to giddir to the
aldirman for this next yeris fischingis Incumand' the aldirman payand the
maile and xxtj s' to the saide Jonhne

the saide day the aldirman and balyeis chargit William scrimgeor'
and philp Dunbrek to mak marion' Kintor be pait of the
Siluer avand' to hir' be Robert austyan' samekile as he grantit
befor Williame Scrimgeour'

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xxvij die Januarij quo Supra

The saide day Jonhne callat franchman grantit that Dauid
blinsel hed pait him ij frankis and demi for the fraucht of j
pip of wyne quhilkis Jonhne Sanclar' hed'

Johannes Cullane Alexander Rede Willelmus blinsele Duncanus Colison' thomas
Waus Willelmus chamer Johannes blak Andreas murray Willelmus Kintor
patricius rede alexander lindesay gilbertus litstar et Johannes thomson'
burgenses dicti burgi Jurati dicunt quod quondam Ranaldus talyour auus
Agnetis gareauche latricis presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus
ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domino nostri Regis de quadam
terra Interiore cum suis pertinenciis Jacente infra dictum burgum In vico Castrj
ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Willelmi nicholson' ex orientali ex
vna et terram Dauid Kintor ex Occidentali partibus ab altera et terram anteriorem
malcomi crag versus austrum et communionem viam regiam versus boriam
Et quod dicta Agnes est vna de legitimis et proprinquioribus heredibus dicti quondam
Ranaldi auj suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est legitime etatis
Et quod dicta terra valet nunc per annum xviij s' et valuit xvj s'
tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in Capite de Suppremo domino Rege
per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit In manibus domini nostri Regis
per mortem dicti quondam Ranaldi auj suj per Spacium annorum aut eocirca In defectu veri heredis Jus
suum hucusque minime prosequentis

Iidem Jurati dicunt quod quondam Richardus gareauche
frater agnetis gareauche latricis presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo
ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de dimidietate cuiusdam terre Jacentis infra dictum
burgum in vico castrj ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam andree murray Junioris
ex orientali ex vna et terram quondam Willelmi mernys ex occidentali partibus ab altera
Et quod dicta agnes est legitima et propinquior heres dicti quondam Ricardi fratris suj de
dicta dimidietate terre cum pertinenciis Et quod est legitime etatis Et quod dicta dimidietas
terra valet nunc per annum vj s' et viij d' et valuit v s' tempore pacis Et quod
tenetur in capite de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit
in manibus de nostri Regis per mortem dicti quondam Ricardi fratris suj per spacium
In defectu veri heredis et cetera

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vltimo
die Januarij anno quo Supra

the saide day comperit William lammyntone and offerit him
redy tile mak amendis and assithment to William blinsel
for the offence committit to him be the ordinance of the
aldirman and Consale

Eodem die comparuerunt georgius bysset procurator assignatus
et cessionarius Agnetis torreleith filie et heredis quondam
Johannis torreleitht et ipsa Agnes ac concesserunt se habuisse
et recipisse per manus prouidi virj thome prat plenariam
Solucionem omnium bonorum sibi agneti Jure hereditario et alias contingen'
de quibus tenuerunt se bene Content' et plenarie Solut' Ac
eundem thomam heredes suos executoresque assignatos pro se heredibus
suis executoribus et assignatis exinde quieteclamarunt
In perpetuum cum pacto de ulterius non petend' Testibus preposito
Jacobo Colison' Andrea Cullan' ore Johanne mar' ballivis
Ricardo Ruthirfurd' thoma Waus Willelmo blinsell David mar'
Willelmo chamer et Dauid' bell

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Williame blinsele forspekar that Johne thomsone sale
preyve one monunday that next Cumis that Alexander andirson'
sauld' to him iij bollis of wod' siclik price as he
sauld' to gilbert litstar' and vthiris

the saide day Williame Symsone committit to pay to
Willekin Skippar' his part of the lott

the said day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
alexander chamer forspekar that the pynoris sal pay the barrel of ber'
that was brokin to Jonhne of Johnstone quhilkis the balyeis
chargit tham to pay within terme of law

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem tercio die mensis
februarij anno quo Supra

head.add: gilyeame balye and Johne meldrum and Jonhne Stevin

div.p:
the saide day Jonhne of meldrum grantit him avand' to
gilyeame balye xviij crovnis Scottis money for certane wyn'
quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law
And' thareftir philp of Dunbrek seriand' at commavnd of the aldirman
and balyeis chargit Jonhne Stevin to remane within the tolbutht
quhill he freid the said' Johne of meldrum of the said'
xviij crovnis becaus' the said' Johne Stevin hed' resavit the said'
wyn' and aw to pay the said' xviij crovnis and freith the said Jhon meldrum tharof

the saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit to Eduard top
monunday the x day of the monetht of februar' Instan'
to preyve that thome of mar' consentit to the prising of the half
nethis that the said' Eduard occupeis pertening to the said' thomas
And' In likwys' thai assignit the said' Eduard the saide day
to preyve that the said' thomas mar' consentit to the seling of the
letter of tak producit In Jugement be the said' Eduarde of ane demi nethis
fischingis of the ferdis and to preiwe that the said' thomas consentit to
the subscripcion of the Samyn and subscriuit It with his hand' and that the
said' Eduard suld' haue It this Instan' yer'

the saide day the wyf of Jonhne talyouris in the gallougate
grantit hir' avand' to Jonhne pyotis wyff x s' and James les
seriand' at commavnd of the balyes chergit hir to reman' within the
tolbutht quhilk scho pait the said' x s' And' atour the said'
seriand' chargit Jonhne talyouris to Remane within the tolbutht quhile
he pait iiij s' to the said' Jonhne pyot and his wyf

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Williame blinsele forspekar that William glassinwortht sal end'
the northt windew of the triangile that he has begunnyn And'
the Est windew of the Southt tofall complet And' atour thai
fynd' the said' Williame glassinwricht avand' thre li' v s' and
vj d' to Sanct nicholas werk de claro

the saide day It was deliuerit be the saide assis' William
blinsele forspekar that Jonhne thomsone sal pay to Alexander andirson'
alsmekile for the iij bollis and j f' of wad' as gilbert litstar'
pait

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
William blinsel forspekar that Jonhne Callat sal deliuer to
Jonhne chapman j barrele of flour' and the saide Johne chapman
sal pay him the fraucht And' at the next cumyn' agan
he sal deliuer to the said Johne chapman demi barrele of
flour' or ellis his obligacion and than the said Johne chap
man sal pay him als'mekile for his barrel of flour' as he
has sauld' the layf of his flour' her' now

head.add: pait to the balye Johne of mar'

div.p:
The secunde day of februar' the yer' forsaid' thir personis eftir
folouing pait this somes of money to John of mar' balye
at the touvnis commavnd' to the aldirmannis expens' to pas' to striuelin
to conclud' and finalie end' ale ald' covntis
In primis William Wormet j merk
Jonhne Retre j merk
Richerd' Waus j merk
patrik red' j merk
Duncan crak j merk
Johne Waus j merk
Johne Wormet ij merkis
gilbert menyes ij merkis
William chamer ij merkis
Johne Knollis xl s'

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem septimo
die februarij anno quo Supra

the saide day thir personis follouing Alexander rede Johne Wormet
William blinsele Androw murray thomas leslie Dauid mar' Duncan
Colison patrik red' Johne Waus Allan litstar Alexander lindesay John
chapman Dauid' fynne and William nicholsone Circualy Inquirit
as in ane Inquest deliuerit and consulit the balyeis tile Entir
Elizibeth' Steuart douchtir to vmquhile Johne steuart in
the land' of vmquhile hir' saide fadir' takand' sikir caucion
of the said' Elizibeth that the said' land' sal nocht be wadset sa nor'
sauld' and deuly vphaldin as efferis in ale thingis als' gude
as It is now ay and to the tyme thar' Cum ane Sufficient
Certificacion that thar' be nayne vthir ayr' nor ayris of lyve
bot the said' Elizibeth to the saide Johne Ande Androw
murray come Souerte be his handis landis and gudis to the
balyeis that the said' lande sal nocht be sauld' wedset nor'
annaleit and that It salbe wel and Sufficientlie vphaldin
als' gude as It is now quhen scho entiris tharwith And'
the saide Elizibeth' oblist hir' to the said androw be hir'
hande vphaldin to releyve the said' androw his ayris and
assigniz' and keip him and thame skathles of the said' Souerte
and to vphald the said lande deuly and neuir to sel nor'
wedset It Ande scho falyeis in the vphaldin of the said
land that It salbe lesum to the saide Androw his ayris ande
assignez' to entromet with the said' land ay and to thar kepine
It be Sufficientlie bigit and vphaldin

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
that Alexander andirsone sal pay to Johne thomsone xvj s'
and iij d' that he had' resauit mair' than was avand tile him
for certane wad' quhilkis Williame of Ketht Come
Souerte to pay be his hande and gudis to the said' Johne within
xv dais

Curia balliuorum burgj de Aberdene' tenta In pretorio
eiusdem decimo die mensis februarij anno quosupra

The saide day Alexander wobster was in amerciament of
the Court be ane suorne assis' Dauid blinsale forspekar
for the wrangwis' Inputting of wrang west in a web
of lynnyn clatht pertening to thome Duthty for the quhilkis he
was in amerciament of the Court and ordanit the said Alexander to mak
the said west als gud as the laif of the clatht

The said' day Dauid mar' sone to thomas mar' was
in amerciament of the Court be his awme tong grant for
the straiblance of the Court and tile amend' as law will
and forbeir' in tyme tocum

The said' day Eduarde top producit Certane witnes
In the actione' debatabile betuix hyme and thomas mar'
anent the tak of ane half nethtis fisching of the furdis et cetera
quhilk deposicionis was takin and the bailyeis contenewit
the warde of the said action' to friday that nixt cumis for
waiknes of the Court

The saide day patrik Rede in the nayme and behalf of
thomas mar protestit quhat Dauid Club dide or saide
suld' turne thomas mar to na preiudice
